comment: The diagonal functor is a functor from the base category to the functor category. Another way of saying this is that the constant functor ` ( y e. D |-> X ) ` is a construction that is natural in ` X ` (and covariant). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
